column1: Gorkil the Goblin King is a hero created for Electronic Artss The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II in the "Goblins" faction. He appears zipping around on top of a large Scorpion. He is voiced by Dave Wittenberg.
*Skull Totem - Places a skull totem which will remain on the map until *destroyed. Reveals the nearby shroud and detects stealth.

column3: and earn experience twice as fast.

column1: *Poisoned Stinger - Targeted enemy becomes stunned and takes poison damage over time.
*Call from the Deep - Summons three Fire Drakes under the casters control
Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II
